text:
【短信】发短信至中国内地0.39元/条，接收免费。
【优惠包】28元30分钟语音月包、东南亚4/7日流量包、10/20元流量月包等更多优惠流量/语音包请前往中国电信APP国际/港澳台页面浏览订购使用。
【自助排障】请使用可以上网的手机访问https://manyou.189.cn/a.do 跟随指引步骤尝试故障修复。
trans:
[Text Messages] Sending SMS to Mainland China: ¥0.39/message , receiving SMS: Free
[Promotional Packages] ¥28 for a 30-minute voice monthly package; data packages for Southeast Asia (4/7 days); ¥10/¥20 monthly data packages. For more discounted data/voice packages, visit the “International/HK, Macau, and Taiwan” section in the China Telecom app to browse and subscribe.
[Self-Service Troubleshooting] Use an internet-enabled phone to access https://manyou.189.cn/a.do and follow the guided steps for issue resolution.
